text: Jerzy Kossela (né Kosela; 15 July 1942 - 7 January 2017) was a Polish guitarist and vocalist. He was born in Częstochowa, Poland. Kossela was the founding member of the bands Electron, Niebiekso-Czarni, Pięciolinie and Czerwone Gitary. Kossela died on 7 January 2017 in Gdynia, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jerzy Kossela profile , Archiwum Polskiego Rocka * Jerzy Kossela profile, Polish Catalogue of Gramophone Records Category:1942 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Polish musicians Category:Guitarists
title: Jerzy Kossela
